welcome: Hello! I'm SupportBot. I will help you create a support ticket.
help_short: Send me a message to create a ticket. Use /language to change language.
ticket_created: Your ticket #{id} has been created {emoji}. Our support team will contact you here.
not_owner: You are not the owner of this ticket.
ticket_resolved: Ticket #{id} marked as resolved {emoji}. Thank you!
